help_message:
- Write /start to begin
 - You can send files, images, videos, etc. and they will be stored in your current path
 - If you write a message to the bot, it will make a directory with that name in the current path
 - If you want to rename the current directory, send /rename {new name}
 - If you want to rename a file, select it then reply to the message with the new file name. *This has a weird behaviour for now: it will rename the last selected file even if you reply to other message*
 - If you want to list your files, send /ls command
 - You can forward text messages from other chats and they will be stored as notes, or simply using /note and your note
 - You can delete files or directories using the red cross next to them
 - You can share a directory using the /share command on the directory you want to share
 - I have tried to make this bot as similar as possible to a basic file explorer
 - You can donate using /donate
 - Ideas and suggestions to @victor141516
share_send: Press this button and choose the person you want to share this directory to
share_receive: I want to share a directory with you using FileX bot. Press the button bellow, then press START in the bot
